NSOpenPanel(NDAlias)

Additional methods of NSOpenPanel to deal with NDAlias instances.

Extends Class: NSOpenPanel
Declared In: NSOpenPanel+NDAlias

Discussion

Adds the single method aliases


Methods

-aliases

Returns an array containing aliases to the selected files and directories.

aliases

Returns an array containing aliases to the selected files and directories. 

- (NSArray *)aliases;
Return Value

NSArray of NDAlias

Discussion

If multiple selections arenâ€™t allowed, the array contains a single alias. The aliases works in a similiar way to -[NSOpenPanel filenames].
